The only small complaint I have is that the print on the back of the shirt can get a little bit hot because it's slightly plasticy. But it's so freaking cool! I get compliments on it all the time! Get it

评论概述: Not the same as the photo & not oversized
评论详情: The second I opened the shirt I was surprised to see that it wasn't an off-white/cream color, but rather plain white. The shirt is the same size as my other medium-sized shirts when the page title says "Loose Oversized". In addition, the printed design isn't like the image where it blends in with the rest of the shirt and is smaller than suggested in the photos.

Shirt fit to size probably the only thing good about it, other then that the shirt doesn’t really like the picture. The shirt looks like they just slap the print on it and called it a day and with that the comfort of is not good
Fast delivery!
The material is tight and not baggy

to be honest, i think this shirt would be great for someone else, just not for me. i sized up a lot for an oversized, baggy look, but it just doesn't work well for that. the fabric feels really stiff & the material used for the print stiffens it more, which affects the fit & appearance. i only really took a star off for that.
We love the way this shirt feels ... even after a lot of washes.
Its so cute and it fits so nice.  Breathable and soft; I'm very happy with the purchase.
The color on the photo had a creamy color to it but when I got it, it's pure white, I still like the shirt but the logos look cartoony  and wasn't really what I was expecting, so 4 stars
Weird material, print looks very different then on picture

I’m 5’1-2 and 109 lbs and this shirt fits a little more like a large than xl so I would size up by 1-2 sizes. The design is great and it fits exactly how I wanted it. It’s a little thin but other than that it’s great

Typically wear a large, or XL at the biggest. Wanted an oversized shirt for the gym, this is far from that. Material is. 5/10, imagine is stiff and rigid to describe it accurately. Was hoping for a good gym shirt at a cheap price. The search continues. 4/10 overall.
Definitely get maybe 2 sizes bigger I got an xl and fit like baggy . Let’s see it holds with a wash
incorrect sizing. i bought a L and XL both were small. Horrible material feels like cardboard
It looks stretched out.
This is not made of cotton. Its a thin polyester type material thats super stretchy. The shirt is super long too.

As soon as i opened it i knew it would be going back. The shirt i received is nothing like what was pictured. Complete rip off quality wise. The shirt isnt even cotton it looks more like polyester with a terrible smell. The tag on the shirt is not at all like the one pictured the shirt is basically see through and do not recommend anyone buy this. The print on the front is completely off and the design on the back feels like paper. The sizing on it is also off i got an XL and it fits like an M.

I expected the designing to be as it looked in the images, however they are noticeably smaller in person. Also, I ordered a large according to the producers measurements and it came smaller than expected. So if you order one, just buy a size above if you want it to be baggy.
I was expecting cotton and it wasn’t. The design in the back is way too thick and generates too much heat.
